text: Mar Mathew Moolakkatt (27 February 1953), an East Syriac knanaya Catholic Archbishop was born in Uzhavoor, India. Currently he is Archbishop of The Knanaya Catholics of Kottayam Archeparchy, succeeding Kuriakose Kunnacherry upon his retirement, he is a member of the Order of St. Benedict. He was entrusted the whole Knanaya catholic community in 2006 January. His mother parish is St. Stephen's forane church uzhavoor. He was the synodal commission chairman of St. Thomas apostolic seminary Vadavathoor. He is one of the members of the permanent synod of the http://www.syromalabarchurch.in/syro- malabar-major-archbishop-curia.php ==References== ==External links== * http://kottayamad.org/arch-bishop-of-kottayam/ * Knanaya Resources Mathew Moolakkattu at Catholic-Hierarchy Category:1953 births Category:Indian Benedictines Category:Benedictine bishops Category:21st-century Eastern Catholic archbishops Category:Archbishops of Kottayam Category:Living people
title: Mathew Moolakkatt
